Create a user-generated shortcut that contains an alias and destination URL.

  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

Should end with \"/\". e.g. \"go/\" for native shortcuts.","type":"string"},"alias":{"description":"canonical link text following go/ prefix where hyphen/underscore is removed.","type":"string"},"roles":{"description":"A list of user roles for the Go Link.","type":"array","items":{"required":["role"],"properties":{"group":{"required":["type","id"],"properties":{"id":{"description":"A unique identifier for the group.
